title: 我想买瓶洗面奶

conversations.english: I would like to buy a bottle of cleansing milk.Can you reoommend me some kinds?
conversations.chinese: 我想买瓶洗面奶。能给我推荐几种吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. What kind of skin do you have?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的。您属于哪种皮肤类型？

title: 列一个购物清单

conversations.english: Are you ready to go shopping?
conversations.chinese: 可以去买东西了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Just a few minutes. I need to make a list of the things that we need.
conversations.reply_chinese: 等一会儿，我先列一个购物清单。

title: 买晚霜和面膜

conversations.english: Hi, there. Look at these.I have collected some ads here. There is a special promotion for Mother's Day this weekend.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，你看，我这收集了一些广告，这个周末有个母亲节的特惠活动。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, yes. Mother's Day is coming. Do you plan to buy anything?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，对啊！母亲节快到了。你准备要买些什么？

title: 购买女性用品

conversations.english: Lisa, I need some help here.
conversations.chinese: 丽莎，我需要你帮一点忙。
conversations.reply_english: What is it, dear?
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，帮什么忙呢？

title: 买善存和牙刷

conversations.english: I'd like to buy a bottle of Centrum, a tooth brushes.
conversations.chinese: 我要买一瓶善存、一个牙刷。
conversations.reply_english: Centrum? We have bottles of thirty and one hundred tablets. Which kind do you want?
conversations.reply_chinese: 善存？我们有30粒装和100粒装的。你要哪一种？

title: 我想买瓶香水Buy a bottle of perfume

conversations.english: What can I do for you, Miss?
conversations.chinese: 小姐，有什么我可以为你效劳的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I want to buy a bottle of perfume for myself.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想给我自己买瓶香水。

title: 我想买些化妆品I want some cosmetics

conversations.english: I want some cosmetics.Could you recommend some?
conversations.chinese: 我想买些化妆品，推荐一些好吗？
conversations.reply_english: I think Pond's is the best.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为，旁氏是最好的

title: 我要买齐全部的化妆品 Cosmetics

conversations.english: I’m hungry, let’s go grab a bite to eat.
conversations.chinese: 我饿了，我们简单吃点东西。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah me too. Oh! Can we stop at the shop really fast? I lost my makeup bag at the airport and I want to pick up a few things.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也饿了，我们能在商店旁停一下吗？我在机场弄丢了化妆包，我想买些东西。

title: 你想买多大的平底锅 Buying a pan

conversations.english: I'm looking for a pan I can use in my kitchen.
conversations.chinese: 我想买个在厨房里用的锅。
conversations.reply_english: Is there any particular size that you want?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想要多大的锅？

title: 这把锅的尺寸正合适但是太重了

conversations.english: I'd like to purchase a pan.
conversations.chinese: 我想买个锅。
conversations.reply_english: Is there any particular size that you want?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你需要多大尺寸的？

title: 麻烦帮我做成礼品的包装 Gift-wrapping

conversations.english: OK. I'd like to have everything gift-wrapped, please.
conversations.chinese: 好的。麻烦帮我包装成礼物的样子。
conversations.reply_english: I'll give you the boxes. You can then go to our gift-wrapping department.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我会给您盒子装。之后您可以去我们的礼品包装部。

title: 可以向我介绍一些能淡化雀斑的美白产品吗

conversations.english: Could you introduce some whitening products for me?
conversations.chinese: 你可以给我介绍一些美白产品吗？
conversations.reply_english: Please forgive me just being frankly, madam. You don't need whitening products because you look pretty white. But you have freckles on your face.
conversations.reply_chinese: 女士，请原谅我说实话。你不需要美白产品因为你看起来很白。但是你的脸上有雀斑。

title: 我想为妻子买支口红作为生日礼物

conversations.english: Good morning, sir. Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 先生，早上好。我可以为您效劳吗？
conversations.reply_english: Good morning. I want to buy a lipstick for my wife because it is her birthday today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。我想给我妻子买支口红，因为今天是她的生日。

title: 使用精油可放松疲惫身体 Essential oil

conversations.english: So what did you get?
conversations.chinese: 那你买了什么？
conversations.reply_english: It's all in the bag.
conversations.reply_chinese: 全在袋子里.

title: 我想买口大锅 A big pan

conversations.english: Can you help me find a pan?
conversations.chinese: 你能帮我找一个锅吗？
conversations.reply_english: Are you looking for a small, medium, or large pan?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在找小锅，中锅还是大锅？

title: 我得买口锅 I need a pan

conversations.english: I need a pan.
conversations.chinese: 我需要一个锅。
conversations.reply_english: Okay. Do you have a particular size in mind?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，你有特别想要的尺寸吗？

title: 我在找送给朋友的结婚礼物 Wedding gift

conversations.english: Excuse me, but I'm looking for a gift for my friend.
conversations.chinese: 不好意思，我在找礼物送朋友。
conversations.reply_english: Is it a Chinese New Year's gift or a birthday gift?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是农历新年的礼物还是生日礼物？

title: 在首饰店为女友挑选礼物

conversations.english: Good afternoon, sir, is there anything I can help you with today?
conversations.chinese: 下午好，先生，你想买什么？
conversations.reply_english: umm... yeah!I’m looking for a nice gift to give my girlfriend. Our fifth anniversary’s next Friday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我正为女友朋友选择一件漂亮的礼物。下周五是我们在一起5周年的日子。

title: 我要买些花向女朋友道歉 Buy some flowers

conversations.english: Hello sir, how may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 先生，你好，需要些什么？
conversations.reply_english: I would like to buy some flowers, please. Something really nice.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想买些花，很漂亮的那种。

title: 在免税商店购买礼物 Duty-free Shop

conversations.english: Can I help you, sir?
conversations.chinese: 有什么可以帮您的吗，先生？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, please. I'm picking out some presents for my children and wife.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我要给我的孩子和妻子挑选一些礼物。
